meta.name: keyword
meta.content: wicket, example, web, j2ee, java, tutorial, dojo

body.section:
**Quick overview of application/tutorial -what is the goal of the tutorial -what does the application do -...**
**paragraph can be used to list comon pre-tutorial user instructions. Illustrate starting position as -check out from cvs -have a page with a form first**
***optional: place a screenshot of completed tutorial app here***
**example paragraph from wicket HelloWorld example** Each Wicket application is defined by an Application object. This object defines what the home page is, and allows for some configuration.
**source code**
Here you can see that we define wicket.examples.helloworld.HelloWorld to be our home page. When the base URL of our application is requested, the markup rendered by the HelloWorld page is returned.
